name: arcadian-archipelago-campaign
description: The Arcadian Archipelago - Pathfinder 2e Campaign Vault

scripts.dev: npm run sync-quartz-config && cd .quartz && npx quartz build --serve --port 8080 --directory .. --output ../public
scripts.build: npm run sync-quartz-config && cd .quartz && npx quartz build --directory .. --output ../public
scripts.preview: npm run sync-quartz-config && cd .quartz && npx quartz build --serve --directory .. --output ../public
